content:
Thank you for the meeting notes @Kevin, very interesting read!

I could see the need for some kind of discovery service, where you can register CDS services and describe their capabilities. For example, this particular CDS service supports the "medication-order" action. A discovery service would expose this metadata via a searchable CDS REST interface and a user-friendly UI.

If there is interest for such a cds discovery service, we could try and implement a concept version as part of our http://simplifier.net platform.
Thanks Michel -- we will keep this in mind as the community coalesces!
